Sequence Information.Peptide Name: AbDfsin  (A. bicolor defensin, natural AMPs; UCSS1a; 3S=S, scorpions, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)

Literature.Author: Yang X, Zhang H, Zuo Z, Qin C, Liu Y, Cao Z, Wu Y.2024
Literature.Reference: Int J Biol Macromol. 2024 Oct 31:137151. doi: 10.1016/j.ijbiomac.2024.137151.PubMed
Literature.Title: Novel structural determinants and bacterial death-related regulatory effects of the scorpion defensin BmKDfsin4 against gram-positive bacteria

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (84.62%) toPersulcatusinR=G: 18%; C: 16%. GRAVY: -0.80; mol Wt: 4381.135; mol formula: C184H289N67O46S6; mol ex coeff: 3355.Chemical modification:  disulfide bonds.Activity: active against S. aureus ATCC6538 or AB94004 (MIC 0.5-2.33 uM) and S. epidermidis AB208187 or AB208188 (MIC 0.5 uM). Warning: other bacteria not tested.
